text: Valeriy Pavlovych Petrov (; 2 March 1955 â€“ 8 March 2022) was a Soviet football player. He played as a striker for SC Tavriya Simferopol. Petrov died from COVID-19 on 8 March 2022 in Simferopol, Ukraine, at the age of 67. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile at Official Site SC Tavriya * Profile at KLISF Category:1955 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Ukraine Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian football managers
